title: Yeni Rize Şehir Stadium
text: Yeni Rize Şehir Stadium is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Rize">Rize</a>, <a href="Turkey">Turkey</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="association%20football">football</a> matches and is the home ground of <a href="%C3%87aykur%20Rizespor">Çaykur Rizespor</a>. The stadium has a capacity of 15,197 spectators and it opened in 2009. It replaced <a href="Rize%20Atat%C3%BCrk%20Stadium">Rize Atatürk Stadium</a> as the home of <a href="%C3%87aykur%20Rizespor">Çaykur Rizespor</a>.
